verses.text: \w Comfort|strong="H5162"\w* ye, \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* ye my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* ye \w comfortably|strong="H3820"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto her, that her \w warfare|strong="H6635"\w* is \w accomplished|strong="H4390"\w*, that her \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* is \w pardoned|strong="H7521"\w*: for she hath \w received|strong="H3947"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w double|strong="H3718"\w* for all her \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 40.2 \ft comfortably: Heb. to the heart\f*\f + \fr 40.2 \ft warfare: or, appointed time\f*

¶ The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of him that \w crieth|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w Prepare|strong="H6437"\w* ye the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, make \w straight|strong="H3474"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H6160"\w* a \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* for our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Every \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* shall be \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w*, and every \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* and \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* shall be made \w low|strong="H8213"\w*: and the \w crooked|strong="H6121"\w* shall be made \w straight|strong="H4334"\w*, and the rough \w places|strong="H7406"\w* \w plain|strong="H1237"\w*:\f + \fr 40.4 \ft straight: or, a straight place\f*\f + \fr 40.4 \ft plain: or, a plain place\f*

And the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*, and all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: for the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cry|strong="H7121"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*? All \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add is\add* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*, and all the \w goodliness|strong="H2617"\w* thereof \add is\add* as the \w flower|strong="H6731"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*:

The \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w withereth|strong="H3001"\w*, the \w flower|strong="H6731"\w* \w fadeth|strong="H5034"\w*: because the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w bloweth|strong="H5380"\w* upon it: \w surely|strong="H0403"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add is\add* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*.

The \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w withereth|strong="H3001"\w*, the \w flower|strong="H6731"\w* \w fadeth|strong="H5034"\w*: but the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ O \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, that bringest good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*; O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that bringest good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* with \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*; lift \add it\add* \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*; \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, Behold your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*!\f + \fr 40.9 \ft O Zion…: or, O thou that tellest good tidings to Zion\f*\f + \fr 40.9 \ft O Jerusalem…: or, O thou that tellest good tidings to Jerusalem\f*

Behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \add hand\add*, and his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* shall \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* for him: behold, his \w reward|strong="H7939"\w* \add is\add* with him, and his \w work|strong="H6468"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 40.10 \ft with strong…: or, against the strong\f*\f + \fr 40.10 \ft his work: or, recompence for his work\f*

He shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* his \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* like a \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*: he shall \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* the \w lambs|strong="H2922"\w* with his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \add them\add* in his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, \add and\add* shall gently \w lead|strong="H5095"\w* those that are with \w young|strong="H5763"\w*.\f + \fr 40.11 \ft that…: or, that give suck\f*

¶ Who hath \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in the hollow of his \w hand|strong="H8168"\w*, and meted \w out|strong="H8505"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* with the \w span|strong="H2239"\w*, and \w comprehended|strong="H3557"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in a \w measure|strong="H7991"\w*, and \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* in \w scales|strong="H6425"\w*, and the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* in a \w balance|strong="H3976"\w*?\f + \fr 40.12 \ft a measure: Heb. a tierce\f*

Who hath \w directed|strong="H8505"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, or \add being\add* his \w counsellor|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* him?\f + \fr 40.13 \ft his…: Heb. man of his counsel\f*

With whom took he \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, and \add who\add* \w instructed|strong="H0995"\w* him, and \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* him in the \w path|strong="H0734"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* him \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and \w shewed|strong="H3045"\w* to him the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*?\f + \fr 40.14 \ft instructed…: Heb. made him understand\f*\f + \fr 40.14 \ft understanding: Heb. understandings?\f*

Behold, the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \add are\add* as a \w drop|strong="H4752"\w* of a \w bucket|strong="H1805"\w*, and are \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* as the small \w dust|strong="H7834"\w* of the \w balance|strong="H3976"\w*: behold, he taketh \w up|strong="H5190"\w* the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* as a very little \w thing|strong="H1851"\w*.

And \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w sufficient|strong="H1767"\w* to \w burn|strong="H1197"\w*, nor the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* thereof \w sufficient|strong="H1767"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.
All \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* before him \add are\add* as nothing; and they are \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* to him less than \w nothing|strong="H0657"\w*, and \w vanity|strong="H8414"\w*.
¶ To whom then will ye \w liken|strong="H1819"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*? or what \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* will ye \w compare|strong="H6186"\w* unto him?

The \w workman|strong="H2796"\w* \w melteth|strong="H5258"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and the \w goldsmith|strong="H6884"\w* \w spreadeth|strong="H7554"\w* it over with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w casteth|strong="H6884"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w chains|strong="H7577"\w*.

He that \add is\add* so \w impoverished|strong="H5533"\w* that he hath no \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* \w chooseth|strong="H0977"\w* a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \add that\add* will not \w rot|strong="H7537"\w*; he \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* unto him a \w cunning|strong="H2450"\w* \w workman|strong="H2796"\w* to \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, \add that\add* shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.\f + \fr 40.20 \ft is so…: Heb. is poor of oblation\f*

Have ye not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*? have ye not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*? hath it not been \w told|strong="H5046"\w* you from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w*? have ye not \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* from the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?

\add It is\add* he that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w circle|strong="H2329"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof \add are\add* as \w grasshoppers|strong="H2284"\w*; that stretcheth \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* as a \w curtain|strong="H1852"\w*, and spreadeth them \w out|strong="H4969"\w* as a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*:\f + \fr 40.22 \ft It is…: or, Him that\f*

That \w bringeth|strong="H5414"\w* the \w princes|strong="H7336"\w* to nothing; he \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* as \w vanity|strong="H8414"\w*.

Yea, they shall not be \w planted|strong="H5193"\w*; yea, they shall not be \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*: yea, their \w stock|strong="H1503"\w* shall not take \w root|strong="H8327"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and he shall also \w blow|strong="H5398"\w* upon them, and they shall \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*, and the \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* shall \w take|strong="H5375"\w* them away as \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*.
To whom then will ye \w liken|strong="H1819"\w* me, or shall I be \w equal|strong="H7737"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w*.

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* who hath \w created|strong="H1254"\w* these \add things\add*, that bringeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* their \w host|strong="H6635"\w* by \w number|strong="H4557"\w*: he \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* them all by \w names|strong="H8034"\w* by the \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w might|strong="H0202"\w*, for that \add he is\add* \w strong|strong="H0533"\w* in \w power|strong="H3581"\w*; not \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w faileth|strong="H5737"\w*.

Why \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w* thou, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, My \w way|strong="H1870"\w* is \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and my \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* is passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* from my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

¶ Hast thou not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*? hast thou not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \add that\add* the \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w Creator|strong="H1254"\w* of the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w fainteth|strong="H3286"\w* not, neither is \w weary|strong="H3021"\w*? \add there is\add* no \w searching|strong="H2714"\w* of his \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

He \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* to the \w faint|strong="H3287"\w*; and to \add them that have\add* no \w might|strong="H0202"\w* he \w increaseth|strong="H7235"\w* \w strength|strong="H6109"\w*.

Even the \w youths|strong="H5288"\w* shall \w faint|strong="H3286"\w* and be \w weary|strong="H3021"\w*, and the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* shall \w utterly|strong="H3782"\w* \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*:

But they that \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w renew|strong="H2498"\w* \add their\add* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*; they shall mount \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with \w wings|strong="H0083"\w* as \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w*; they shall \w run|strong="H7323"\w*, and not be \w weary|strong="H3021"\w*; \add and\add* they shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*, and not \w faint|strong="H3286"\w*.\f + \fr 40.31 \ft renew: Heb. change\f*
